alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:34PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN JUAB AND SOUTHWESTERN UTAH COUNTIES... At 533 PM MDT...A snow squall was 19 miles southwest of Elberta, or 19 miles west of Nephi...moving east northeast at 15 mph. Locations impacted include... Nephi, Elberta, Mona, Jericho and Little Sahara State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 228 and 238. US Route 6 between mile markers 115 and 135, and between mile markers 147 and 149. * winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to produce hazardous driving conditions. Travel is not advised during this snow squall. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on to increase the visibility of your vehicle to those around you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
